General.Name: Central African Gold Inc
General.Description: African Energy Metals Inc., a natural resource company, engages in the acquisition, development, and exploration of mineral properties in the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC). It explores for lithium, tin, tantalum, rare earths, uranium, silver, and copper metals. The company holds interests in the Manono Project covering an area of 30 Kms² located in Manono region; Falea project located in Mali, West Africa; and 200 Kms² of concessions located in the Kalehe Territory in South Kivu. The company was formerly known as Central African Gold Inc. and changed its name to African Energy Metals Inc. in February 2022. African Energy Metals Inc. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 750 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2I7
